mapper.select: select count(*) from book where book_name like '%'||#{book_name}||'%'

select c.* from(select rownum brnum, b.* from (select rownum arnum, a.* from (select * from book order by book_name asc) a) b where book_name like '%'||#{book_name}||'%') c where c.brnum >= #{startRow} and c.brnum <= #{endRow}

select rownum num, data.* from (select book_name, book_writer, book_publisher, book_publish_date, book_cost, book_price, book_imgxl_url, book_isbn from book where book_isbn = 9788970873268 or book_isbn = 9788965135586 or book_isbn = 9791188874385)data

select rownum num, data.* from (select book_name, book_writer, book_publisher, book_publish_date, book_imgxl_url, book_intro, book_isbn from book where book_amount >= 110 order by book_amount DESC)data

select rownum num, data.* from (select book_name, book_writer, book_publisher, book_publish_date, book_cost, book_price, book_isbn , book_imgxl_url, book_intro from book WHERE book_publish_date >= TO_DATE('20190701','YYYYMMDD') AND book_publish_date < TO_DATE('20190731','YYYYMMDD'))data where rownum <= 10
